title: The Fox
description: Brian “the Irish fox” McNamara is one of the most charming bachelors in the state of New York. He is tall, Irish and handsome.Emma Abbott is a photographer, the second child of two lawyers and has a thing for awkward situations.During an all girls’ night out, Brian and Emma collide into each other and although strangers, he kisses her.When back at home, the curious Emma looks for Brian online and she discovers that, though sexy, he also belongs to the “wild” side of the law.Brian works for his father, an Irish boss, and has a huge problem (denial) about dealing with his feelings.The Fox is a stand-alone romantic comedy, part of a series “Meet me on the wild side”.
author: Aura Conte
